name: The Fast and Furriest
description:
The Fast and Furriest is created by NonPareil Institute, a non-profit group that provides technical training for individuals on the autistic spectrum. NonPareil Institute provides job and life skills to equip autistic individuals to live and work. NonPareil offers training in game design, programming, sound, music, and 2D/3D art. More importantly we offer a safe place for men and women to be more than what society expects. Here they learn teamwork, find community and work to achieve fulfilled lives.

SUPPORT / FEEDBACK
Are your Animal Racers giving you trouble? Do they insist on falling down and running away? We would love to hear from you. Let us know what you love and don't love about The Fast and Furriest.

Contact us at: appsupport@npitx.org

NonPareil Institute hopes you enjoy The Fast and Furriest. More content is coming soon!
